info.title: GETI Edge
info.description: Edge inference server for GETI models

schema.title: Response List Sources Api Sources Get

post.description: Create and configure a new source

schema.title: Source Config
schema.description: Configuration for the new source. The exact list of fields that can be configured depends on the source type.

ip_camera.description: Configuration for an IP camera source

video_file.description: Configuration for a video file source

images_folder.description: Configuration for a folder containing images source

schema.title: Response Create Source Api Sources Post
Response Get Source Api Sources  Source Id  Get

schema.description: Partial source configuration update. May contain any subset of fields from the respective source type (e.g., 'device_id' for webcams; 'video_path' for video files). Fields not included in the request will remain unchanged. The 'source_type' field cannot be changed.
schema.title: Source Config

video_file.description: Change the video path for a video file source

schema.title: Response Update Source Api Sources  Source Id  Patch

200.description: Source configuration exported as a YAML file

schema.title: Response Import Source Api Sources Import Post
Response List Sinks Api Sinks Get

post.description: Create and configure a new sink

schema.title: Sink Config
schema.description: Configuration for the new sink. The exact list of fields that can be configured depends on the sink type.

folder.description: Configuration for a local filesystem folder sink

mqtt.description: Configuration for an MQTT message broker sink

schema.title: Response Create Sink Api Sinks Post
Response Get Sink Api Sinks  Sink Id  Get

schema.description: Partial sink configuration update. May contain any subset of fields from the respective sink type (e.g., 'broker_host' and 'broker_port' for MQTT; 'output_path' for folder sinks). Fields not included in the request will remain unchanged. The 'sink_type' field cannot be changed.
schema.title: Sink Config

folder.description: Change the output path for a folder sink

mqtt.description: Change the topic for an MQTT sink

schema.title: Response Update Sink Api Sinks  Sink Id  Patch

200.description: Sink configuration exported as a YAML file

schema.title: Response Import Sink Api Sinks Import Post
Response List Pipelines Api Pipelines Get

post.description: Create and configure a new pipeline

schema.description:
Configuration for the new pipeline. Requires the IDs of a source, sink, and model to be combined into a pipeline.
The fields 'source_id', 'sink_id', and 'model_id' can be set to `None` to only partially initialize the pipeline.

basic.description: Configuration for a basic pipeline with source, model, and sink

minimal.description: Pipeline with only a name (components can be assigned later)

get.description: Get info about a given pipeline

schema.description:
Partial pipeline configuration update. May contain any subset of fields including 'name', 'source_id', 
'sink_id', or 'model_id'. Fields not included in the request will remain unchanged.
schema.title: Pipeline Config

switch_model.description: Change the active model for the pipeline

reconfigure.description: Change the name, source and sink of the pipeline

delete.description: Delete a pipeline. Pipelines must be first disabled (status must be idle) before deletion.

post.description:
Activate a pipeline.
The pipeline will start processing data from the source, run it through the model, and send results to the sink.
Stop a pipeline. The pipeline will become idle and it won't process any data until re-enabled.

200.description: Pipeline configuration exported as a ZIP file

get.description: Get information about a specific model

patch.description: Update the metadata of an existing model

rename_model.description: Change the name of the model

delete.description:
Delete a model by name

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; use `DELETE /api/models/{model_id}` instead

post.description:
Activate a model

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; use instead `PATCH /api/pipelines/{pipeline_id}` to change the active model

get.description:
Get the current input stream configuration.

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; you should use instead:
    - `GET /api/sources` to list the sources
    - `GET /api/pipelines/{pipeline_id}` to find the source used in a given pipeline

schema.title: Response Get Source Config Api Inputs Get

post.description:
Configure the input stream for the application.

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; you should use instead:
    - `POST /api/sources` to create a new source
    - `PATCH /api/sources/{source_id}` to update an existing source
    - `PATCH /api/pipelines/{pipeline_id}` to change the source used in a pipeline

get.description:
Get the current output configurations.

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; you should use instead:
    - `GET /api/sinks` to list the sinks
    - `GET /api/pipelines/{pipeline_id}` to find the sink used in a given pipeline

schema.title: Response Get Sink Config Api Outputs Get

post.description:
Configure the destination(s) for the application output.

NOTE: this endpoint will be removed; you should use instead:
    - `POST /api/sinks` to create a new sink
    - `PATCH /api/sinks/{sink_id}` to update an existing sink
    - `PATCH /api/pipelines/{pipeline_id}` to change the sink used in a pipeline

get.description: Returns the used memory in MB and total available memory in MB.

schema.title: Response Get Memory Api System Metrics Memory Get

post.description:
Handle an incoming WebRTC offer via HTTP POST.

Processes the SDP offer and ICE candidates from the client to establish
a WebRTC connection.

Args:
    body: A Pydantic model containing the SDP offer, optional ICE candidate,
          type ('offer'), and a unique WebRTC ID.

Returns:
    A dictionary containing the SDP answer generated by the server.

Handle incoming telephone calls (e.g., via Twilio).

Generates TwiML instructions to connect the incoming call to the
WebSocket handler (`/telephone/handler`) for audio streaming.

Args:
    request: The FastAPI Request object for the incoming call webhook.

Returns:
    An HTMLResponse containing the TwiML instructions as XML.

zip_file.title: Zip File
zip_file.description: ZIP file containing the pipeline configuration and optionally model binaries

yaml_file.title: Yaml File
yaml_file.description: YAML file containing the sink configuration

yaml_file.title: Yaml File
yaml_file.description: YAML file containing the source configuration

Model.title: Model
Model.description:
Base model schema that includes common fields for all models.
This can be extended by other schemas to include additional fields.
